mapper.update: UPDATE t_result SET group_id = #{groupId},issue_time= #{issueTime},service_pack_id=#{servicePackId},issuer_id = #{issuerId} WHERE id = ( SELECT a.id FROM (SELECT tr.id FROM t_result tr, t_forms tf WHERE tr.form_name = tf.name AND tf.method = #{method} AND user_id = #{userId}ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT 1)a)
mapper.select: SELECT * from t_result WHERE id = ( SELECT a.id FROM (SELECT tr.id FROM t_result tr, t_forms tf WHERE tr.form_name = tf.name AND tf.method = #{method} AND user_id = #{userId}ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT 1)a)
